description:
See the world by snowshoe. These models are designed for all-day comfort and ease of use with nearly any footwear. The shape and adjustable binding optimize yoru stride efficiency and egronomics without sacrificing traction in lower angle terrain.

  • Aluminum 360-degree traction frames with TPU-coated nylon deck
  • Paraglide™ binding has stretch mesh to hold the foot securely without pressure points
  • Binding straps are easy to use, even when wearing gloves
  • Accepts MSR 5in. modular tails to add additional flotation for heavier loads and less supportive snow
name: MSR Lightning Trail Snowshoes - Unisex
